body.raw:
# Refactoring Patterns

Common refactoring patterns and how to implement them with Codebuff.

## Extract Method

Learn how to use Codebuff to identify and extract repeated code patterns:
- Detect duplicate code
- Suggest meaningful names
- Handle parameter passing
